title: Scheduled Maintenance - September 14, 2023
content: We will be performing a scheduled maintenance for EU Worlds on Thursday, September 14, 2023 at 5:00 AM PDT (8:00 AM EDT / 2:00 PM CEST / 10:00 PM AEST).

title: Cash Shop Update for September 13
content: Premium Surprise Style Box, Change Royal Styles, and Mystery Mix Coupons!

title: v.244 Hotfixes - September 7, 2023
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.244 Punch King Palooza update.

title: [Sold Out] MapleStory Fest 2023 Tickets Now Available!
content: MapleStory Fest Tickets are officially sold out, and we look forward to seeing you all on October 14!

title: Livestream - Community Hangout w/ CM Ezrabell! - August 8, 2023
content: Come hang out with CM Ezrabell as he plays MapleStory with fellow Maplers!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Maintenance - September 7, 2023
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 5 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.
